Translations.Text: Ass ideg ara ssemlilen ar tmessi, icenga n Oebbi, nitni ad pwajemmlen
Alamma, mara awven $uoes, ad cehhden fellasen, $ef wayen xeddmen, imeeeu$en nnsen, allen nnsen, d igwelman nnsen
Ad inin i igwelman nnsen: "acimi id tcuhhdem fella$"? A d inin: "Issenieq a$ d Oebbi, id Issentaqen yal cci. Neppa, Ixelq ikwen tikelt tamezwarut, u $uoeS ara tu$alem
Ur tezmirem ara a ppeffrem, ur cehhden fellawen imeeeu$en nnwen, allen nnwen, akked igwelman nnwen. Maca, t$ilem ur Ieeo ara Oebbi, aias n wayen txeddmem
Akka ameyyez nnwen $ef Mass nnwen. Isqucc ikwen, tegwram d d imexsuoen
Xas ueboen, di tmes ara zed$en. Ma ssutren ssmae, ur llin d wid ara ipwaqeblen
Nefka yasen imeddukwal i sen icebbeen ayen illan zdat sen, akked wayen illan deffir sen. Iuao fellasen wawal ger leoyus n yimdanen akw n leonun, i i$aben, uqbel nnsen. Ih, nitni d imexsuoen
